name: Papyrus The Game
description:
This game was based on the movie avatar, it´s a 2d platformer.

This was a university project and our first Game in unity!!

We made everything in this game except the music.

Main Features:
  • 2d platformer;
  • You can only kill 3 enemies;
  • You have 2 types of arrows, normal arrows that kill enemies, and poison arrows that stun enemies;
  • Player has to find poison in plants to use the poison arrows, normal arrows are infinite; 
Controls:

Papyrus The Game is compatible with most standard computer keyboards and mouses.

  • Basic movment: WA;
  • Jump: Space bar;
  • Shoot arrow: Left click;
  • Change Arrow: Scroll wheel;
Further Information
